title: Gross domestic product ( GDP ) growth rate in Germany 2024
yAxis: GDP growth compared to previous year
summary: In general GDP growth compared to previous year has rose over the Year.
GDP growth compared to previous year is slightly increasing from 2019 to 2020, and lastly roughly constant from 2020 to 2024.
The line significantly increased by 0.71 from Year 2019 to 2020.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2019 and 2020.
The highest GDP growth compared to previous year, of value 1.44 was reached at Year 2021
Minimum GDP growth compared to previous year about 0.54 was reached at Year 2019
min_summary: Overall GDP growth compared to previous year has increased over the Year.
GDP growth compared to previous year is slightly increasing from 2019 to 2020, and lastly roughly constant from 2020 to 2024.
mid_summary: In general GDP growth compared to previous year has rose over the Year.
GDP growth compared to previous year is slightly increasing from 2019 to 2020, and lastly roughly constant from 2020 to 2024.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2019 and 2020.
The highest GDP growth compared to previous year, of value 1.44 was reached at Year 2021
Minimum GDP growth compared to previous year about 0.54 was reached at Year 2019
max_summary: Overall GDP growth compared to previous year has increased over the Year.
GDP growth compared to previous year is slightly increasing from 2019 to 2020, and lastly roughly constant from 2020 to 2024.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2019 and 2020.
The highest GDP growth compared to previous year, of value 1.44 was reached at Year 2021
Minimum GDP growth compared to previous year about 0.54 was reached at Year 2019
The line drastically increased by 2.3 times from Year 2019 to 2020.
